snippet: Alexis Gougeard broke away from the pack and stayed ahead to win the 19th stage of the Vuelta a España.
abstract: Alexis Gougeard wins 19th stage at Vuelta a Espana while Tom Dumoulin keeps overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Alexis Gougeard broke away from the pack and stayed ahead to win the 19th stage of the Vuelta a España.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Cycling; Lead in Vuelta Expands
